channel.title: [SRL][RS2] RIP RSC's Updated Autotalker, Latest version 28-8-06
channel.description: Well i updated it again thx to the help of Ron and Solemn Wishes. There is only one thing that has to be done and that is the cancel button, it doesnt work. So if you want to cancel just press the 'X' and it terminates the script. Please leave feedback or say hi ;)

@Ron wrote:

Make a cancel button which will terminate the script.

If(ClickedOnCancel)Then
Begin
TerminateScript;
End;

lol.

item.title: [SRL][RS2] RIP RSC's Updated Autotalker, Latest version 28-8-06
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Several problems…

Can’t set the Wait in the form. It types waaay too fast.

If you click on run, and then click on the X button on the form to kill it, the script will still start. lol.

No blank option for color or effect, so you have to erase color and effect to get it to just say selling whatever, without colors of effects. Just a little user friendly tip. Just make the first option for both color and effect blank.

One last thing. If you add the procedure ClearDebug; right before WriteLn(‘Progress Report for RIP RSCs Autospeak.’); then it will clear the bottom and then write the progress report. Looks better that way, but that’s just my opinion.

Cool script though. Better than most.

Read full topic
item.source: [SRL][RS2] RIP RSC's Updated Autotalker, Latest version 28-8-06
